name: The forgotten phobia
description:
The forgotten phobia is a horror puzzle game made in 2D pixel graphics.

History:

Waking up in the middle of the night, our hero goes in search of his mother. After going around the whole house, and failing, he has to get out into a dark forest. Find out what the loud night rain and thick trees are hiding.

You have to take on the role of a little boy who woke up in the middle of the night and could not find his mother. You will need to drive yourself very quietly so that the monsters who took your mom don't catch you either. There are many rooms in the house, each of which contains riddles that you have to solve with your wit and ingenuity.

Remember forgotten fears ...
